Class AlbumController

java.lang.Object
view.AlbumController
public class AlbumController extends Object
Controller for managing the album view. This class handles the logic for displaying, adding, removing, and managing photos within an album.
Author:
Reuben Thomas, Ryan Zaken

  • Constructor Details

    • AlbumController

      public AlbumController()

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init(Photos app, User user, Album album)
      Initializes the controller with the application, user, and album.
      Parameters:
      app - The main application instance.
      user - The user who owns the album.
      album - The album being managed.

    • handleAddPhoto

      public void handleAddPhoto()
      Handles the action of adding a photo to the album. Opens a file chooser to select an image file and adds it to the album.

    • handleRemovePhoto

      public void handleRemovePhoto()
      Handles the action of removing a photo from the album. Prompts the user for confirmation before removing the selected photo.

    • handleCaptionPhoto

      public void handleCaptionPhoto()
      Handles the action of adding or updating a caption for a selected photo. Opens a dialog to input the caption and updates the photo's caption.

    • handleDisplayPhoto

      public void handleDisplayPhoto()
      Handles the action of displaying the details of a selected photo. Opens a new window to show the photo's details.

    • handleAddTag

      public void handleAddTag()
      Handles the action of adding a tag to a selected photo. Opens a dialog to select a tag type and value, and adds the tag to the photo.

    • handleRemoveTag

      public void handleRemoveTag()
      Handles the action of removing a tag from a selected photo. Opens a dialog to select a tag to remove and removes it from the photo.

    • handleCopyPhoto

      public void handleCopyPhoto()
      Handles the action of copying a photo to another album. Opens a dialog to select a target album and copies the selected photo to it.

    • handleMovePhoto

      public void handleMovePhoto()
      Handles the action of moving a photo to another album. Opens a dialog to select a target album and moves the selected photo to it.

    • handleSlideshow

      public void handleSlideshow()
      Handles the action of starting a slideshow of the photos in the album. Opens a new window to display the slideshow.

    • handleBack

      public void handleBack()
      Handles the action of navigating back to the user home view. Switches the scene to the user home view.
